Html:
Hi,

I am using PHPExcel to generate the reports in my application. My Reports includes the sone graphs like pie,bar and line graphs. I am geeting the problem with Pie graph legends(Color Keys text). Legends are not displaying in the excel file.

If any one have a solution please provide the solution.
I am having the same issue with legends not displaying for pie charts in Excel 2010 with PHP 5.5.3. Any help would be much appreciated.

i'm also having the same problem, when i download the file generated by PHPexcel and open it with Microsoft Excel 2007 in windows 7 it gives me the fallowing error, "Excel found unreadable content in .xlsx.Do you want to recover the contents of this workbook?...", i click "yes" and another window is prompt, "Repairs to .xlsx ", "Excel was able to open the file by repairing or removing the unreadable content.", "Repaired Records:Drawing from /xl/drawings/drawings1.xml part(drawing shape)".
and the pie chart appears but without the data series Labels.

I also tried the same with PHPexcel example "33chartcreate-pie.php" and i'm having the same issue.

In Fedora19 using boxes as a virtual machine with Windows 7 and using Microsoft Office 2007

PHP Version:5.3.8

Thanks in advance and happy holidays.
Found the solution to my problem in this thread Problem with creating charts
